Actions.Name: Assign order
Actions.Description: This API method used to set orders to be assigned in WithoutWire. The order status will be set to Waiting for Picking. All operators that are set for the role of pick will have access to these orders.

Actions.Name: Consume Inventory
Actions.Description: Consume Inventory

Actions.Name: Create Inbound Request
Actions.Description: Create Inbound Request

Actions.Name: Create Inventory Adjustment
Actions.Description: Create Inventory Adjustment

Actions.Name: Create Inventory Request
Actions.Description: Create Inventory Request

Actions.Name: Create New Item
Actions.Description: This method creates new item

Actions.Name: Create Location
Actions.Description: Create Location (Bin)

Actions.Name: Create or Update Purchase Order
Actions.Description: This method creates or updates the Purchase Order.

Actions.Name: Create Site
Actions.Description: This action creates a new warehouse in the system.

Actions.Name: Create or Update Manufacturing Order
Actions.Description: This method creates or updates manufacturing order.

Actions.Name: Create Update Sales Order
Actions.Description: Create or Update Sales Order

Actions.Name: Create Update Transfer Order
Actions.Description: Create Update Transfer Order

Actions.Name: Create or update work order
Actions.Description: The method creates or updates work order (key is OrderNumber)

Actions.Name: Delete Inbound Request
Actions.Description: This API will delete purchase orders from WithoutWire. Receiving must not have been started, and the status needs to be either 'Unassigned', or 'Waiting to be Received'. This call should be used when a mistake is found, or the purchase order needs to be modified.

Actions.Name: Delete Order
Actions.Description: Delete an order (all types)

Actions.Name: Get Barcode Info
Actions.Description: This is used to retrieve the matching entity types for a provided barcode.

Actions.Name: Get Inbound Request
Actions.Description: This method allows the exporting of purchase orders by a combination of filters. These filters include begin and end date, receiving status code, item number, line receipt status, purchase order number and purchase order type. The Purchase Order Export Object returns a list of completed order information.

Actions.Name: Get Inventory
Actions.Description: Returns an array of inventory items by specified parameters

Actions.Name: Get Inventory Aggregate
Actions.Description: Get Inventory Aggregate

Actions.Name: Get Manufacturing Orders
Actions.Description: This method returns array of manufacturing orders, filtered by sent parameters

Actions.Name: This action returns Purchase Orders filtered by parameters
Actions.Description: This method allows the exporting of purchase orders by a combination of filters. These filters include begin and end date, receiving status code, item number, line receipt status, purchase order number and purchase order type. The Purchase Order Export Object returns a list of completed order information.

Actions.Name: Get Sales Orders
Actions.Description: This method returns array of sales orders, filtered by sent parameters

Actions.Name: Get Transfer Orders
Actions.Description: This method returns array of transfer orders, filtered by sent parameters

Actions.Name: Get work orders
Actions.Description: Returns an array of work orders, filtered by sent parameters

Actions.Name: Inbound Complete
Actions.Description: This API method used to set purchase orders to complete in WithoutWire. The order status is set to 'Complete'. Additional fields updated are: ExportDate on the purchase order object is set to the current date/time and the CompletedDate is set to the current date/time. Finally, the receiving assignments will be removed.  An error is returned if the order is in “Receiving in Progress”.

Actions.Name: Receipt Complete
Actions.Description: Receipt Complete

Actions.Name: Set order complete
Actions.Description: This API method used to set the status on orders to CMP (Complete).

Actions.Name: Set order status
Actions.Description: This API method used to set the status on orders in WithoutWire. Parameters include: OrderStatusCode and warehouseName

Actions.Name: Single Scan Inventory Lookup
Actions.Description: This method returns list of items on a LP or in DropShip box.
